Message:
As the snow began
piling up around the
gorgeously decorated city,

so many couples looked around
for presents with smiles
on their faces.

But, how can simply
buying a present for
the one I love be enough...?

And besides, I know everything
there is to know about you.

So, I’m well aware you’ll be
happy with any gift from me.

That’s why my gift needs
to be something that’ll
truly make you happy.

After all, this is our very first
Holy Night together, my prince.

My gift can’t be anything
but special.

Just you wait.
I’ll be sure to give you
something filled with
every single drop of my love.
